documents.document: @IceQueenkmb *Happy Friday Eve Kathleen! Hope your week has been awesome so far! 🙂
@ONAIRwithDYLAN @party934 *I hope you enjoy your new time slot! thanks for letting me know!
@party934now @ONAIRwithDYLAN *Another great show Dylan! Thanks! Enjoy the rest of your week...I'm charged up for mine now! 💗💕
There are so many good people out there...they just don't get as much air time. Here's a few...keep your eye out f… https://t.co/YIZsuaRCYp
@iambillysmom @birdhousebooks @GizmoAdventures @bunnyrabbitdach @CBCMurdoch *Can't blame him...I'm hooked on Murdoch too! LOL!
@IceQueenkmb *Happy 2017!! Yes all is well so far...hope the same for you. 💗
@FOXLA * We need more people like this...to make more stories like this...so we can realize there really are more good people out there!
@IceQueenkmb * yellow roses...always a good choice.
@iambillysmom @birdhousebooks @GizmoAdventures @bunnyrabbitdach * Awesome!! Happy New Year!
@PCArsenault @PCPappy *A great start to the new year! Happy 2017!
@AdoptADonkey @DonkeysLeeds * Happy Birthday William! https://t.co/jVuYxXJhim
Wishing you all a peaceful year full of blessings and love. Reach for your goals...take risks...live every moment y… https://t.co/5C7eUepFYi
Dogs are amazing...we could take lessons from them...couldn't we? https://t.co/NjpB4Sxmcm
@hugo_kelpie * I'm sure if you said "please" mum would make it open faster little one. Works or my little guy every time...hint hint...
@iambillysmom * just got back...lots of people & lots of deals too. Stores over buy food for the holidays then discount it after. Lucky me!
@Livindeadgirl25 *I'm so sorry. Sending love and strength to you and your family. 💔
@NWDogRescue *Karma will catch up to them soon enough. Glad he's in good hands now & has a wonderful future ahead. 💗💕
@MichelleBurley1 * Glad he's ok! Very sweet idea to save the vm...but let's hope you never have to use them for that reason. (hugs)
@iambillysmom @GizmoAdventures @birdhousebooks @joyinbama2 @bunnyrabbitdach @helencarnate *Poor tree! Hope the weight doesn't break it! 😟
@samsBellabob * Awwwww....maybe next time? https://t.co/YldSCU2auR
@samsBellabob * I'm sure your mum gave you a pie for being so patient though right? 😍
@iambillysmom @GizmoAdventures @birdhousebooks @bunnyrabbitdach *this will look great once the snow is on it too! 🎄
It's the weekend so I invited a few friends over...that's ok right? https://t.co/5vwo4gvDmX
Winter gets here on a Monday? I hope this isn't the opening gambit to your Winter Game! So not funny Mother Nature! https://t.co/imG2BrJ9HZ
Thank you to all who serve(ed) to protect us and give us the rights and freedoms we enjoy today. https://t.co/ter0E7h6Xd
@IceQueenkmb * Yes!! The world need more stories like this out there...not just the bad ones!
Now this is how it's done! xo https://t.co/lMZe61XI7t
Let the weekend begin! Have a great one!!! https://t.co/OCcQxhNzq1
@ONAIRwithDYLAN @RadioRewinds * Another excellent show Dylan thanks! I'm now recharged for the rest of the week. 🎼🎷🎺🎸🎻🎤
@ONAIRwithDYLAN *Favourite shower song...whatever is on radio at the time...that I can hear over the dog howling once I start singing! LOL!
@ONAIRwithDYLAN * Just a few more hours until Dylan brightens up our week! 🎤🎼
Happy Thanksgiving to all my Canadian friends! Count your many blessings and share them as often as you can! xo https://t.co/bcoS0tr4Ev
Yes it's Monday...but it's raining...so it's not all bad right? https://t.co/T3nJCtcBgv
@IceQueenkmb *Aww...thank you. New look for new adventures! He's well thanks...enjoyed his summer travels. https://t.co/9NKjlReHpo
@cdntoadie *So you disappeared for more than a few days this time! That's ok...so did I! Smile!! https://t.co/ilfg0oc9Kc
You mean that wasn't a long weekend...& I should have been at work yesterday too? https://t.co/UiA8ZSNvDh
Waving goodnight to everyone on National Dog Day. https://t.co/mp3kLK0aRZ
@iambillysmom @birdhousebooks @GizmoAdventures @joyinbama2 @DaSuperQuinn @MuddyPawsPet * Magical. Thanks for sharing
Hands up if you're ready for the weekend!! Have a great one!!! https://t.co/z1prxIrpYM
@cdntoadie * so apparently the whole Twitter thing isn't going very well!? Have fun...post something!!!! 😜😜😜
@lynda_oneplanet @DogsTrust * I'm sure he remembers your b-day...I saw him in the jewellery store last week. Oops! Pretend to be surprised!
@lynda_oneplanet @DogsTrust * Haha! It's not spoiling...it's just an elevated lifestyle! Plus he deserves it.
@TheLeslieBecker * Heartbreaking news. I am so sorry you lost your mum. Sending strength and comfort to you. (hug)
@lynda_oneplanet @DogsTrust * Happy Birthday handsome! Hope mummy gives you lots of extra treats today! 💗💕
@elfowl1 * Thanks Tracy! 💜
@ONAIRwithDYLAN * Fantastic show as always Dylan...it just isn't Wednesday without your show! 🙂
Weather has been too hot for too long...hair had to get shorter! https://t.co/rbLom4A7vz
@ONAIRwithDYLAN *Just a few minutes until another awesome show! Take it away Dylan!! 🎤
Ok Monday...do your worst...we're ready for you! https://t.co/kmWjT6MDXH
Happy weekend everyone! You've made it the end of another wild week. Rest...relax...lets make next week better! https://t.co/N1wbPvmcyH
@kidsneedtoread @CapstonePub * Amazingly generous! So many kids will be so happy! Squeeeeeee!
Mummy...why do people only take pictures of us on Wednesday? https://t.co/scUp4JrD2I
@lynda_oneplanet *Thanks Lynda! Look to the north tonight...you'll probably see all the fireworks! LOL!
Happy Canada Day to all my Canadian friends! Have a great time celebrating Canada's 149th Birthday! 🎉 https://t.co/eX8eAfXsCv
Has Monday gone yet? Is it safe to come out now? https://t.co/kQcBjy1xzI
Yes it's the weekend...no I'm not getting dressed until Monday! https://t.co/mWXmWS1zgL
@IceQueenkmb *I think if bad messages can spread so fast then so can good ones...we just have to try a bit harder...& stay with it...
@IceQueenkmb *It's a cute way of getting the message out there...education can come in many forms...
@IceQueenkmb * I love this! Happy Monday Kathleen! 🙂
Don't forget to visit Tim's today!! They will donate 100% of each code sold to send kids to camp! Yeah!! https://t.co/wva3kDBs71
Happy Memorial Day! For those who are serving now or have served in the past...I send you many thanks. https://t.co/gtChQmXxnj
When the alarm goes off and you realize it's a three day weekend...& this is Tuesday... https://t.co/0iEiwjFH1j
@tracy_in_uk * wow! Where is this? LOL!
Can you see the weekend from there? Should be easy to see...it's a long one!! https://t.co/9L2vR0c6Bp
@cinnysangel * very neat...glad you could see them too!
@cinnysangel * Thanks! Can you see the balloons too? I just saw them once when I opened Twitter for the first time today. Very cool
@tracy_in_uk * hope you're ok!? 😖
@IceQueenkmb *I love this pic...very sweet...thank you.
Who says you have to just have cake for your Birthday!? Nom nom nom!!! https://t.co/7tfhpIlWGz
@tracy_in_uk * Thank you Tracy! 🎉🎁🎉🎁
@IceQueenkmb * My birthday is today! I won't tell you how old...but it's a big "0" year! Weeeeee! 🎉🎁🎂🎈
@IceQueenkmb *I must be Taurus with all other houses rising...I like them all! LOL!
@tracy_in_uk *I know what you mean...we had a little snow & hail today!! Didn't stay but it sure is colder now! (rolls eyes)
@IceQueenkmb *sorry to hear you weren't well but happy you're better now. I've been off Twitter for a while...sorry I lost touch.
@IceQueenkmb *hi Kathleen! Yes it is. I'm doing well thanks. Hope you're enjoying Spring and are well. xo
I hope your Sunday is going something like this... https://t.co/iICvbCr6yQ
For all the firefighters in Fort McMurray...and everywhere else they save lives! https://t.co/TJFh4zvx6K
There goes the weekend...sigh... Have a great week everyone! https://t.co/xfuQBynARM
@adamjacksonp *Yikes! That's literally too close to home!!
@cinnysangel *wait till you push them up on your nose...but they're not there...& you just poke yourself between the eyes! LOL!!
Yes it's Monday...no I'm not ready for it yet... https://t.co/ZUKJ6UUdsy
Everything is more difficult on Monday...you just have to find a way around it...sigh... https://t.co/ytynoPv5a0
Which way to the weekend...which way to the weekend...????? https://t.co/IP6kDj2AlS
@CTVNews *With all the other issues facing the courts now this is how our top lawyers choose to spend their expertise?
I'm not sure it's really Spring... https://t.co/TVySHFY9Kq
Mondays are just more difficult than other days...they just are... https://t.co/voGRK1EKYV
@pig_who_lived *Happy Monday little one!! Have a great week! Soon you'll have lots of mud to play in too! Yeah!
@tracy_in_uk * Thanks Tracy! xo
Happy Easter to all who celebrate! https://t.co/LupGIvJpSt
I'm guessing creativity isn't a priority in this colouring contest...what do you think? https://t.co/SRXW0Taal2
Happy Spring Equinox everyone!! Warm weather is just around the corner...I think... https://t.co/dQ9fmyowpt
Green beer is realllly good!! *hic hic* Happy St. Patrick's Day!! (party safely everyone!). 🍀☘🍀 https://t.co/3EArc3narZ
@Sifichick * thanks! It's off to a good start...let's hope it stays that way! 😊😊
@Sifichick *Animals can be funny...without even trying! LOL! Have a great week! 🙂
Monday won't find me here... https://t.co/OjnX4xXD4X
Is Monday over yet??? https://t.co/VFCL7gjM3P
@kidsneedtoread @azrenfest *Have a great Ren. Fest! Can't wait for the pics!
There's always so much to do on the weekend! Make sure add in some time for fun! Happy weekend everyone! https://t.co/D6oljr6ugH
Out of my way...I've got to get to the weekend...NOW!!! https://t.co/9X7zGB7yZR
@SeeUnext2sday *try now??
